dcterms:creator: L. Prasad
B. Tyagi
H. Gupta
dcterms:description: This dataset involves the optimal control of a nonlinear inverted pendulum system using PID controller and LQR, with performance analysis conducted both without and with disturbance input.
dcterms:title: Inverted Pendulum System

dcterms:creator: P. C. N. Verheijen
M. Lazar
D. Goswami
dcterms:description: This dataset pertains to a small water distribution network, modeled using balance of mass and energy equations, with nonlinearities in pressure losses in the pipes.
dcterms:title: Small Water Distribution Network
